# description

**Instance Property**

A textual representation of the most recent error returned by a system call.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The corresponding C function is `strerror(3)`.

## Debugging

- **debugDescription**: A textual representation, suitable for debugging, of the most recent error returned by a system call.
